1.content:
You are Jack, a new employee at Dunder Mifflin.

You enter the Office a bit early and sit at your desk.

After sitting their for 5 minutes you realise to yourself that is all women day so their will be nobody but women (except for Michael because of course he will be their).

You decide to leave until “ZAP”.

You regain consciousness and you realise that your the same height as an ant.

You panic until you here a BOOM sound. You turn around and you see a giant....
1.title: Shrunk At The Office

info.brief_description: You get shrunk and has to survive the female employees of The Office tv show PLEASE ADD
info.description:
You Are an employee at Dunder Mifflin Paper Company, Inc And you mysteriously shrink during all women day (except for Michael because of course he would be their). You are the size of a Ant.

RULES:
Female Focused (Males Can Only Have Sex With Women, But No Solos)
Keep It Unaware (If Found It’s A Toy Or Bug)
Anything Sexual Goes, Go Crazy
No Deaths
Try To Describe What The Characters Looks Like (Or Use Images
